001    package org.greatage.ioc.cache;
002    
003    import org.greatage.util.DescriptionBuilder;
004    
005    /**
006     * This class represents cache source implementation for OSCache cache API.
007     *
008     * @author Ivan Khalopik
009     * @since 1.0
010     */
011    public class OSCacheSource extends AbstractCacheSource {
012            private final boolean useMemoryCaching;
013            private final boolean unlimitedDiskCache;
014            private final boolean overflowPersistence;
015    
016            /**
017             * Creates new instance of cache source for OSCache cache API.
018             *
019             * @param useMemoryCaching      determines if the memory caching is going to be used
020             * @param unlimitedDiskCache  determines if the disk caching is unlimited
021             * @param overflowPersistence determines if the persistent cache is used in overflow only mode
022             */
023            public OSCacheSource(final boolean useMemoryCaching,
024                                                     final boolean unlimitedDiskCache,
025                                                     final boolean overflowPersistence) {
026                    this.useMemoryCaching = useMemoryCaching;
027                    this.unlimitedDiskCache = unlimitedDiskCache;
028                    this.overflowPersistence = overflowPersistence;
029            }
030    
031            /**
032             * {@inheritDoc}
033             */
034            public <K, V> Cache<K, V> getCache(final String name) {
035                    final com.opensymphony.oscache.base.Cache cache =
036                                    new com.opensymphony.oscache.base.Cache(useMemoryCaching, unlimitedDiskCache, overflowPersistence);
037                    return new OSCache<K, V>(cache, name);
038            }
039    
040            /**
041             * {@inheritDoc}
042             */
043            @Override
044            public String toString() {
045                    final DescriptionBuilder builder = new DescriptionBuilder(getClass());
046                    builder.append("useMemoryCaching", useMemoryCaching);
047                    builder.append("unlimitedDiskCache", unlimitedDiskCache);
048                    builder.append("overflowPersistence", overflowPersistence);
049                    return builder.toString();
050            }
051    }
